name: BlockVerse
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
Free to play, play to earn, earn to live, live to play! Earn "$USDT" or "$BLOCK" 
Seamlessly bridging blockchain technology across Web-2 and Web-3 enabled systems within play-to-earn (P2E) gaming, art, collectibles and entertainment industries.

Block Usecases - :

Subscriptions :
Own a subscription to showcase your artwork. Viewers and collectors have to pay a fixed crypto fee in $BLOCK to get access to your artwork in the metaverse.

Gaming :
Whether its Battle Royale, Arcade or simple PVP games, $BLOCK is your in-game currency as well as your P2E reward.

MetaVerse :
$BLOCK gives you access to our artifacts in gaming platforms like Oculus, Minecraft and Roblox.

NFT's : 
$BLOCK allows you to purchase/use game agnostic utility NFT's in the game of your choice in the OmniaVerse ecosystem.

Own a subscription to showcase your artwork. Viewers and collectors have to pay a fixed crypto fee in $BLOCK to get access to your artwork in the metaverse.

Gaming :
Whether its Battle Royale, Arcade or simple PVP games, $BLOCK is your in-game currency as well as your P2E reward.

MetaVerse :
$BLOCK gives you access to our artifacts in gaming platforms like Oculus, Minecraft and Roblox.

NFT's : 
$BLOCK allows you to purchase/use game agnostic utility NFT's in the game of your choice in the OmniaVerse ecosystem.
description.sl:
Free to play, play to earn, earn to live, live to play! Earn "$USDT" or "$BLOCK" 
Seamlessly bridging blockchain technology across Web-2 and Web-3 enabled systems within play-to-earn (P2E) gaming, art, collectibles and entertainment industries.

Block Usecases - :

Subscriptions :
Own a subscription to showcase your artwork. Viewers and collectors have to pay a fixed crypto fee in $BLOCK to get access to your artwork in the metaverse.

Gaming :
Whether its Battle Royale, Arcade or simple PVP games, $BLOCK is your in-game currency as well as your P2E reward.

MetaVerse :
$BLOCK gives you access to our artifacts in gaming platforms like Oculus, Minecraft and Roblox.

NFT's : 
$BLOCK allows you to purchase/use game agnostic utility NFT's in the game of your choice in the OmniaVerse ecosystem.
